1487c3e0-b399-4e4d-9395-055162b1fe49.name: Signature Gear
1487c3e0-b399-4e4d-9395-055162b1fe49.notes: For equipment normally bought with money, each point gives goods worth up to 50% of the average campaign starting wealth (but never cash).

features.situation: to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial
to all rolls to notice interruptions while obsessed with a task

fa6c56c2-c466-4b30-bd2e-bedc30fa57db.name: Curious
fa6c56c2-c466-4b30-bd2e-bedc30fa57db.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

dad13957-16cd-4725-b27e-1713360e4b05.name: Delusion (Every strange occurence has a supernatural explanation)

44964096-a53a-45b8-9f08-68adcb0cc260.name: Honesty
44964096-a53a-45b8-9f08-68adcb0cc260.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

67d3028c-7666-40b0-aa00-f3456219699d.name: Lecherousness
67d3028c-7666-40b0-aa00-f3456219699d.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have more than the briefest contact with an appealing member of the sex you find attractive, at -5 if this person is Handsome/Beautiful, or at -10 if Very Handsome/Very Beautiful. If you fail, you must make a “pass” using whatever wiles and skills you can bring to bear.

0b18b0fa-0a70-4809-a8a5-f4a47ad1aad1.name: Overconfidence
0b18b0fa-0a70-4809-a8a5-f4a47ad1aad1.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs

a6421860-0c79-4afc-8dd8-3d058754c913.name: Post-Combat Shakes
a6421860-0c79-4afc-8dd8-3d058754c913.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

df1ff15c-8336-4ae5-abd8-dffbd29d330d.name: Selfish
df1ff15c-8336-4ae5-abd8-dffbd29d330d.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces
from others

5e843806-f649-42d5-9809-915fad0879ac.name: Trickster
5e843806-f649-42d5-9809-915fad0879ac.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!

c1db198f-ab99-4a59-9f5e-792530df9e51.name: 30 points from the following
c1db198f-ab99-4a59-9f5e-792530df9e51.notes: May choose options from the 20 point group

features.situation: to others
to IQ-based skills when alone
to others
to IQ-based skills when alone, or only -1 if in a group of 4 or less

73959e94-3cea-4c82-a4b1-426d8ebae685.name: Loner
73959e94-3cea-4c82-a4b1-426d8ebae685.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

707cf82b-fead-415e-a437-4739300d09af.name: Flashbacks
707cf82b-fead-415e-a437-4739300d09af.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he will roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you have a flashback. The GM will roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.

e66d07e9-3a32-4993-9ec4-ab99f97d440e.name: Mild
e66d07e9-3a32-4993-9ec4-ab99f97d440e.notes: Duration: 2d seconds; -2 on all skill rolls

dea65bf7-f5a5-408b-be53-69896a7394b9.name: Severe
dea65bf7-f5a5-408b-be53-69896a7394b9.notes: Duration: 1d minutes; -5 on all skill rolls

9529ef70-5491-4e2e-b152-9c00304b6972.name: Crippling
9529ef70-5491-4e2e-b152-9c00304b6972.notes: Duration: 3d minutes; Precludes all skill use

ad28822f-5550-4c98-97f1-3b09ffeae7de.name: Greed
ad28822f-5550-4c98-97f1-3b09ffeae7de.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

features.situation: toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

38866a9c-6174-4f03-b39e-90da3aeb37ec.name: Nightmares
38866a9c-6174-4f03-b39e-90da3aeb37ec.notes: Make a self-control roll each morning upon awakening. If you fail, you suffered nightmares; this costs you 1 FP that you can only recover through sleep. On a roll of 17 or 18, you are left shaking, and are at -1 to all skill and Perception rolls for the entire day.

features.situation: from others
toward any stranger and any “legitimate” reaction penalty (e.g., for an unfriendly race or nationality) is doubled
